nodes.bodyText: I'd say logging error is not needed here either as if control reaches catch-block there will be notification for the user and the error can be found from the network activity. Also this logs (nearly) the same error as in the previous comment

I think it is still good practice to log it into the console as well because that is a more obvious place to look for it rather than finding the correct request under the network tab.
I removed the console log in this component to prevent duplication but kept it in the store level.
